section.section: There is a Maryland College Savings Bond Advisory Board.
The purpose of the Board is to advise the Board of Public Works on the issuance of college savings bonds authorized under § 8-123.3 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.

text.section:
The Board shall consist of the following four members:
The State Treasurer;
The Secretary of Higher Education; and
Two members appointed by the Governor.

Factors to be considered in appointing members to the Board may include:
Experience, skill, or knowledge in the areas of public finance and investment banking; or
Experience in the field of higher education finance.
The Treasurer shall serve as chair of the Advisory Board.
